itemDisplayName: Deploy a simple Ubuntu VM  for test purposes
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple Ubuntu VM using a few different options for the Ubuntu versions and locations. This will deploy a A4 size machines.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a Ubuntu VM, using the latest patched version. Source https://github.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates/blob/master/101-vm-simple-linux/metadata.json
